name: Loop Cut
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47! (Theme: Stuck in a Loop)

Defend the reactor from hordes of enemies in this small wave-defense game!

CONTROLS:

Move Blade with Mouse

Shoot by Left Clicking

Slash enemies for an instant kill!

Any feedback on the game is greatly appreciated!

High score is saved, even if you leave the page. Feel free to revisit the game at a later date!

Music made by Abstraction :D (www.abstractionmusic.com)
